data.oai_dc:dc: GPS tracking and accelerometer data of individual Eurasian Oystercatchers foraging in the intertidal

This file contains GPS tracking data and accelerometer data of 10 individually tracked Eurasian Oystercatchers. GPS fixes have been linked to metadata on weather, sun/moon position, bathymetry and tidal information. Covers the period 1 August 2011 - 1 Mar 2012.
